mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, div, contents, read_cnt, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS regDt, reg_id AS regId, DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD')) AS modDt, mod_id AS modId FROM board WHERE div = '20' ORDER BY mod_dt DESC

SELECT seq, title, div, contents, read_cnt, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS regDt, reg_id AS regId, DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD')) AS modDt, mod_id AS modId FROM board WHERE div = '10' ORDER BY mod_dt DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD SELECT BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL seq, '제목'||LEVEL title, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL,2),1,10,20) div, '내용'||LEVEL contents, 0 read_cnt, sysdate - LEVEL reg_dt, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL,2),1,'james','admin') reg_id, sysdate - LEVEL mod_dt, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL,2),1,'james','admin') mod_id FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <=502
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, div = #{div}, contents = #{contents}, mod_dt = sysdate, mod_id = #{modId} WHERE seq = #{seq}
